verses.text: \w Paul|strong="G3972"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w Timotheus|strong="G5095"\w*, the \w servants|strong="G1401"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, to \w all|strong="G3956"\w* the \w saints|strong="G0040"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* which \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w at|strong="G1722"\w* \w Philippi|strong="G5375"\w*, \w with|strong="G4862"\w* the \w bishops|strong="G1985"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w deacons|strong="G1249"\w*:

\w Grace|strong="G5485"\w* \add be\add* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w peace|strong="G1515"\w*, \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w our|strong="G2257"\w* \w Father|strong="G3962"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add from\add* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.
I \w thank|strong="G2168"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w upon|strong="G1909"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w remembrance|strong="G3417"\w* of \w you|strong="G5216"\w*,

\w Always|strong="G3842"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w prayer|strong="G1162"\w* of \w mine|strong="G3450"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w making|strong="G4160"\w* \w request|strong="G1162"\w* \w with|strong="G3326"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w*,

\w For|strong="G1909"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w fellowship|strong="G2842"\w* \w in|strong="G1519"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* \w from|strong="G0575"\w* \w the|strong="G2250"\w* \w first|strong="G4413"\w* \w day|strong="G2250"\w* \w until|strong="G0891"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w*;

Being confident \w of|strong="G3982"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* very \w thing|strong="G0846"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* he which hath \w begun|strong="G1728"\w* \w a|strong="G2041"\w* \w good|strong="G0018"\w* \w work|strong="G2041"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* will \w perform|strong="G2005"\w* \add it\add* \w until|strong="G0891"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*:

Even \w as|strong="G2531"\w* it \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w meet|strong="G1342"\w* for \w me|strong="G1698"\w* to \w think|strong="G5426"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w of|strong="G5228"\w* \w you|strong="G5216"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w*, \w because|strong="G1223"\w* \w I|strong="G3165"\w* \w have|strong="G2192"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* my \w heart|strong="G2588"\w*; inasmuch \w as|strong="G1722"\w* \w both|strong="G5037"\w* \w in|strong="G1199"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w bonds|strong="G1199"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* in the \w defence|strong="G0627"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w confirmation|strong="G0951"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*, \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w are|strong="G5607"\w* \w partakers|strong="G4791"\w* \w of|strong="G5485"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w grace|strong="G5485"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w record|strong="G3144"\w*, how \w greatly|strong="G5613"\w* I \w long|strong="G1971"\w* after \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w bowels|strong="G4698"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* I \w pray|strong="G4336"\w*, \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w* may \w abound|strong="G4052"\w* \w yet|strong="G2089"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w more|strong="G3123"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w knowledge|strong="G1922"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add in\add* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w judgment|strong="G0144"\w*;

\w That|strong="G1381"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* may approve \w things|strong="G1381"\w* that are \w excellent|strong="G1308"\w*; \w that|strong="G2443"\w* ye may \w be|strong="G5600"\w* \w sincere|strong="G1506"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* without \w offence|strong="G0677"\w* \w till|strong="G1519"\w* the \w day|strong="G2250"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*;

Being \w filled|strong="G4137"\w* with the \w fruits|strong="G2590"\w* of \w righteousness|strong="G1343"\w*, which \w are|strong="G3588"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w glory|strong="G1391"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w praise|strong="G1868"\w* of \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* I \w would|strong="G1014"\w* \w ye|strong="G5209"\w* should \w understand|strong="G1097"\w*, \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* the \w things|strong="G3588"\w* \add which happened\add* \w unto|strong="G2596"\w* \w me|strong="G1691"\w* have fallen \w out|strong="G2064"\w* \w rather|strong="G3123"\w* \w unto|strong="G1519"\w* the \w furtherance|strong="G4297"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*;

So \w that|strong="G5620"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w bonds|strong="G1199"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w are|strong="G1096"\w* \w manifest|strong="G5318"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3650"\w* the \w palace|strong="G4232"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G3062"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w other|strong="G3062"\w* \add places\add*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w many|strong="G4119"\w* of the \w brethren|strong="G0080"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w Lord|strong="G2962"\w*, waxing \w confident|strong="G3982"\w* \w by|strong="G1199"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w bonds|strong="G1199"\w*, \w are|strong="G5111"\w* much \w more|strong="G4056"\w* \w bold|strong="G5111"\w* to \w speak|strong="G2980"\w* the \w word|strong="G3056"\w* without \w fear|strong="G0870"\w*.

\w Some|strong="G5100"\w* \w indeed|strong="G3303"\w* \w preach|strong="G2784"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w even|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* \w envy|strong="G5355"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w strife|strong="G2054"\w*; \w and|strong="G1161"\w* \w some|strong="G5100"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w of|strong="G1223"\w* good \w will|strong="G2107"\w*:

The \w one|strong="G3588"\w* \w preach|strong="G2605"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w contention|strong="G2052"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w sincerely|strong="G0055"\w*, \w supposing|strong="G3633"\w* to \w add|strong="G2018"\w* \w affliction|strong="G2347"\w* \w to|strong="G1199"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w bonds|strong="G1199"\w*:

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* the \w other|strong="G3588"\w* \w of|strong="G1537"\w* \w love|strong="G0026"\w*, \w knowing|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I am \w set|strong="G2749"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* the \w defence|strong="G0627"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*.

\w What|strong="G5101"\w* \w then|strong="G1063"\w*? \w notwithstanding|strong="G4133"\w*, \w every|strong="G3956"\w* \w way|strong="G5158"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* in \w pretence|strong="G4392"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* in \w truth|strong="G0225"\w*, \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* is \w preached|strong="G2605"\w*; \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w I|strong="G5463"\w* \w there|strong="G5129"\w*\w in|strong="G1722"\w* do \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*, \w yea|strong="G0235"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* will \w rejoice|strong="G5463"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* shall \w turn|strong="G0576"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w my|strong="G3427"\w* \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w* \w through|strong="G1223"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w prayer|strong="G1162"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* the \w supply|strong="G2024"\w* of the \w Spirit|strong="G4151"\w* of \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*,

According \w to|strong="G2596"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* earnest \w expectation|strong="G0603"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \add my\add* \w hope|strong="G1680"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3762"\w* I shall be \w ashamed|strong="G0153"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \add that\add* \w with|strong="G1722"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w boldness|strong="G3954"\w*, \w as|strong="G5613"\w* \w always|strong="G3842"\w*, \add so\add* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* shall be \w magnified|strong="G3170"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w my|strong="G3450"\w* \w body|strong="G4983"\w*, \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* \add it be\add* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w life|strong="G2222"\w*, \w or|strong="G1535"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w death|strong="G2288"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* to \w me|strong="G1698"\w* to \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \add is\add* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w die|strong="G0599"\w* \add is\add* \w gain|strong="G2771"\w*.

\w But|strong="G1161"\w* \w if|strong="G1487"\w* I \w live|strong="G2198"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w*, \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \add is\add* the \w fruit|strong="G2590"\w* \w of|strong="G2041"\w* \w my|strong="G3427"\w* \w labour|strong="G2041"\w*: \w yet|strong="G2532"\w* \w what|strong="G5101"\w* I shall \w choose|strong="G0138"\w* I \w wot|strong="G1107"\w* \w not|strong="G3756"\w*.

\w For|strong="G1063"\w* I am in a \w strait|strong="G4912"\w* \w betwixt|strong="G1537"\w* \w two|strong="G1417"\w*, \w having|strong="G2192"\w* a \w desire|strong="G1939"\w* \w to|strong="G1519"\w* \w depart|strong="G0360"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* to \w be|strong="G1511"\w* \w with|strong="G4862"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*; which \w is|strong="G4183"\w* \w far|strong="G3123"\w* \w better|strong="G2908"\w*:

\w Nevertheless|strong="G1161"\w* to \w abide|strong="G1961"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* the \w flesh|strong="G4561"\w* \add is\add* more \w needful|strong="G0316"\w* \w for|strong="G1223"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*.

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w having|strong="G3982"\w* \w this|strong="G5124"\w* \w confidence|strong="G3982"\w*, I \w know|strong="G1492"\w* \w that|strong="G3754"\w* I shall \w abide|strong="G3306"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* continue \w with|strong="G4839"\w* \w you|strong="G5213"\w* \w all|strong="G3956"\w* \w for|strong="G1519"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w furtherance|strong="G4297"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w joy|strong="G5479"\w* of \w faith|strong="G4102"\w*;

\w That|strong="G2443"\w* \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w rejoicing|strong="G2745"\w* may be more \w abundant|strong="G4052"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w Jesus|strong="G2424"\w* \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w* \w for|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w* \w by|strong="G1223"\w* \w my|strong="G1699"\w* \w coming|strong="G3952"\w* \w to|strong="G4314"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w* \w again|strong="G3825"\w*.

\w Only|strong="G3440"\w* let your conversation \w be|strong="G4176"\w* as it \w becometh|strong="G0516"\w* the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*: \w that|strong="G2443"\w* \w whether|strong="G1535"\w* I \w come|strong="G2064"\w* \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w see|strong="G1492"\w* \w you|strong="G5209"\w*, or \w else|strong="G1535"\w* be \w absent|strong="G0548"\w*, I may \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* of \w your|strong="G5216"\w* \w affairs|strong="G4012"\w*, \w that|strong="G3754"\w* ye stand \w fast|strong="G4739"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w spirit|strong="G4151"\w*, \w with|strong="G5590"\w* \w one|strong="G1520"\w* \w mind|strong="G5590"\w* striving \w together|strong="G4866"\w* for the \w faith|strong="G4102"\w* of the \w gospel|strong="G2098"\w*;

\w And|strong="G2532"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w nothing|strong="G3367"\w* \w terrified|strong="G4426"\w* \w by|strong="G5259"\w* your \w adversaries|strong="G0480"\w*: \w which|strong="G3748"\w* \w is|strong="G2076"\w* to \w them|strong="G0846"\w* an evident \w token|strong="G1732"\w* of \w perdition|strong="G0684"\w*, \w but|strong="G1161"\w* to \w you|strong="G5213"\w* of \w salvation|strong="G4991"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w that|strong="G5124"\w* \w of|strong="G0575"\w* \w God|strong="G2316"\w*.

\w For|strong="G3754"\w* unto \w you|strong="G5213"\w* it is \w given|strong="G5483"\w* in the \w behalf|strong="G5228"\w* of \w Christ|strong="G5547"\w*, \w not|strong="G3756"\w* \w only|strong="G3440"\w* to \w believe|strong="G4100"\w* \w on|strong="G1519"\w* \w him|strong="G0846"\w*, \w but|strong="G0235"\w* \w also|strong="G2532"\w* to \w suffer|strong="G3958"\w* \w for|strong="G5228"\w* \w his|strong="G0846"\w* \w sake|strong="G5228"\w*;

\w Having|strong="G2192"\w* \w the|strong="G0073"\w* \w same|strong="G0846"\w* \w conflict|strong="G0073"\w* \w which|strong="G3634"\w* ye \w saw|strong="G1492"\w* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*, \w and|strong="G2532"\w* \w now|strong="G3568"\w* \w hear|strong="G0191"\w* \add to be\add* \w in|strong="G1722"\w* \w me|strong="G1698"\w*.
